column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////If you're into crispy deep dish then this place is for you! I got the Chicago deep dish style and tbh
column2: I enjoyed the crust because I like the crisp Â definitely fulfilling. You get to place your name first and then place your order as well so when you get seated
column3: you won't have to wait for the pizza as long. However
column4: I went during 9 pm and no wait; I suggest for those impatient people to do that and just eat later to avoid the hangry-ness.
